name: Ha Giang- Home for 22 Ethnic Groups in Vietnam
description: Have you ever heard about Ha Giang the up north of Vietnam? in which you will see one different Vietnam that you've never seen before in your life. No where in Vietnam can you meet more than 20 ethnic groups like here. Ha Giang is not only famous for stunning view like Dong Van Karst Plateau Geopark, or Heaven's Gate, or Ma Pi Leng Pass, but the local, the traditional and unique beauty also attracts tourists from all over the world.
